name: Ulcerate
text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You lose 3 life.

editions.flavor:
"If it were merely lethal, that would be sufficient. The art, however, is in maximizing the suffering it causes."
—Liliana Vess

name: Ulrich of the Krallenhorde
text:
Whenever this creature enters the battlefield or transforms into Ulrich of the Krallenhorde, target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Ulrich of the Krallenhorde.

name: Ulrich's Kindred
text:
Trample
{3}{G}: Target attacking Wolf or Werewolf gains indestructible until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"I am not its master. We are of the same pack."
—Ulrich, Krallenhorde alpha

name: Ulrich, Uncontested Alpha
text:
Whenever this creature transforms into Ulrich, Uncontested Alpha, you may have it fight target non-Werewolf creature you don't control.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Ulrich, Uncontested Alpha.

name: Ultimate Price
text: Destroy target monocolored creature.

editions.flavor: "He's paid his price. Now you pay mine."

"Let him be an example to others who would default on their debts to us."
—"The Cozen," Orzhov assassin

"The realization that one is dying is far more terrifying than death itself."
—Sidisi, Silumgar vizier

name: Ulvenwald Abomination
text: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

editions.flavor:
"The Eldrazi are all too practiced at twisting natural into unnatural."
—Nissa Revane

name: Ulvenwald Bear
text: Morbid — When Ulvenwald Bear enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.

editions.flavor:
Out chasing bears
—Kessig expression meaning "died in the woods"

name: Ulvenwald Captive
text:
Defender
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. 
{5}{G}{G}: Transform Ulvenwald Captive.

editions.flavor:
"Even on a plane as dark as this one, nature will organize a defense against the unnatural."
—Nissa Revane

name: Ulvenwald Hydra
text:
Reach
Ulvenwald Hydra's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
When Ulvenwald Hydra enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

name: Ulvenwald Mysteries
text:
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.

name: Ulvenwald Mystics
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Ulvenwald Mystics.

editions.flavor: "With this ritual, we cast aside our fragile humanity . . ."

name: Ulvenwald Observer
text: Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater dies, draw a card.

editions.flavor:
"I tell you, the trees were closing in! It's by the grace of the Heron alone that I made it out of the Ulvenwald!"
—Ricton, traveling merchant

name: Ulvenwald Primordials
text:
{G}: Regenerate Ulvenwald Primordials.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Ulvenwald Primordials.

editions.flavor: ". . . and embrace the ancient ferocity of the undying Wild."

name: Ulvenwald Tracker
text: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature you control fights another target creature.

editions.flavor: "Peace will come to Innistrad, but only after all abominations have been dealt with, one by one."
"Peace will come to Innistrad, but only after all abominations have been dealt with, one by one."

name: Umara Entangler
text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

editions.flavor: "Sea Gate is gone, the Halimar basin empty. But rebuild the seawall and give these waters time, and they will fill the basin anew."

name: Umara Raptor
text:
Flying
Whenever Umara Raptor or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Umara Raptor.

editions.flavor: Messenger, weapon, friend.

name: Umbilicus
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns a permanent he or she controls to its owner's hand unless he or she pays 2 life.

editions.flavor: It was the explorers' only tether to reality.

name: Umbral Mantle
text:
Equipped creature has "{3}, {Q}: This creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn." ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
Equip {0}

editions.flavor: It harnesses the power of night in a land where daylight fears to show itself.

name: Umbra Mystic
text: Auras attached to permanents you control have totem armor. (If an enchanted permanent you control would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy an Aura attached to it.)

editions.flavor: "I have found the courage to face death—twice, if I must."

name: Umbra Stalker
text: Chroma — Umbra Stalker's power and toughness are each equal to the number of black mana symbols in the mana costs of cards in your graveyard.

editions.flavor: Don't venture into the darkness, lest it decide not to let you leave.

name: Umezawa's Jitte
text:
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage, put two charge counters on Umezawa's Jitte.
Remove a charge counter from Umezawa's Jitte: Choose one —
• Equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
• Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
• You gain 2 life.
Equip {2}

name: Unbender Tine
text: {T}: Untap another target permanent.

editions.flavor: Creations made in madness may contain great power. The path to that power is as labyrinthine as the creator's mind.
Creations made in madness may contain great power. The path to that power is as labyrinthine as the creator's mind.

name: Unblinking Bleb
text:
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
Whenever Unblinking Bleb or another permanent is turned face up, you may scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Unbreathing Horde
text:
Unbreathing Horde enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other Zombie you control and each Zombie card in your graveyard.
If Unbreathing Horde would be dealt damage, prevent that damage and remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

name: Unbridled Growth
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
Sacrifice Unbridled Growth: Draw a card.

editions.flavor:
"If the Consulate has abandoned restraint, so too shall the wilds."
—Surash, keeper of the Cowl

name: Unburden
text:
Target player discards two cards.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

editions.flavor:
"Ambition requires clarity. If you have any doubts, they must be abandoned."
—Bontu, god of ambition
Cabal initiates enter training full of hopes and fears. They graduate with neither.

name: Unburial Rites
text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

editions.flavor: All crave the Blessed Sleep. Few receive it.
All crave the Blessed Sleep. Few receive it.

name: Uncaged Fury
text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

editions.flavor:
"It's right to fear those that you keep locked away."
—Rahilda, Vildin-Pack alpha

name: Uncanny Speed
text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"To survive, we must embrace the savagery we knew in our race's infancy."
—Edgar Markov

name: Unchecked Growth
text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. If it's a Spirit, it gains trample until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"That energy was once granted to growing things. Now the kami keep it for themselves, releasing it in sudden floods that overwhelm flesh and foliage alike."
—Sakiko, Mother of Summer

name: Uncle Istvan
text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Uncle Istvan by creatures.

editions.flavor: Solitude drove the old hermit insane. Now he only keeps company with those he can catch.
Solitude drove the old hermit insane. Now he only keeps company with those he can catch.
Solitude drove the old hermit insane. Now he only keeps company with those he can catch.

name: Uncontrollable Anger
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and attacks each turn if able.

editions.flavor: To an akki warrior, gravity is the direction of the nearest unsmashed face.
A barbarian's heart pounds with the fury of a prisoner, threatening at any moment to break the bars of its cage.

name: Uncontrolled Infestation
text:
Enchant nonbasic land
When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.

editions.flavor: The grounds of the Riptide Project are now populated only by slivers, broken beakers, and the lonely screeching of gulls.

name: Uncovered Clues
text: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

editions.flavor: The Implicit Maze winds through Ravnica, connecting arcane landmarks of all ten guilds.

name: Undead Alchemist
text:
If a Zombie you control would deal combat damage to a player, instead that player puts that many cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from his or her library, exile that card and create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

name: Undead Executioner
text: When Undead Executioner dies, you may have target creature get -2/-2 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Heartless killer in life, brainless killer in death.

name: Undead Gladiator
text:
{1}{B}, Discard a card: Return Undead Gladiator from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
Cycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Undead Leotau
text:
{R}: Undead Leotau gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
Unearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

editions.flavor:
"The work that went into creating this magnificent specimen. Horrific, deadly, well-balanced. Not all necromancers do elegant work like this."
—Lestin, necromancer

name: Undead Servant
text: When Undead Servant enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each card named Undead Servant in your graveyard.

editions.flavor: "Get up. You're not finished yet."—Liliana Vess

name: Undead Slayer
text: {W}, {T}: Exile target Skeleton, Vampire, or Zombie.

editions.flavor: "My motive is not vengeance but mercy. I deliver the soulless back to their severed souls."

name: Undead Warchief
text:
Zombie spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Zombie creatures you control get +2/+1.

editions.flavor: It has the strength of seven men. In fact, it used to be seven men.
It has the strength of seven men. In fact, it used to be seven men.
It has the strength of seven men. In fact, it used to be seven men.

name: Undercity Informer
text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a land card, then puts those cards into his or her graveyard.

editions.flavor: "Scandal and slander are never welcome news. That's why I'm never the messenger."

name: Undercity Plague
text:
Target player loses 1 life, discards a card, then sacrifices a permanent.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

name: Undercity Reaches
text:
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may draw a card.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.

name: Undercity Shade
text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
{B}: Undercity Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"Officially, there's nothing under that bridge to hunt . . . Unofficially, my torchers are too terrified to go there after nightfall."
—Agrus Kos

name: Undercity Troll
text:
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
{2}{G}: Regenerate Undercity Troll. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

name: Underground River
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Underground River deals 1 damage to you.

name: Underground Sea
text: ({T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.)

name: Undergrowth
text:
As an additional cost to cast Undergrowth, you may pay {2}{R}.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. If its additional cost was paid, Undergrowth doesn't affect combat damage that would be dealt by red creatures.

editions.flavor: "It is the work of sorcery. Burn it!" —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter
"The art of war is turning obstacle to advantage." —Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order Advocate

name: Undergrowth Champion
text:
If damage would be dealt to Undergrowth Champion while it has a +1/+1 counter on it, prevent that damage and remove a +1/+1 counter from Undergrowth Champion.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Undergrowth Champion.

name: Undergrowth Scavenger
text: Undergrowth Scavenger enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

editions.flavor: It sees a rotting carcass as a good wine which has been aged properly.

name: Underhanded Designs
text:
Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice Underhanded Designs: Destroy target creature. Activate this ability only if you control two or more artifacts.

name: Undermine
text: Counter target spell. Its controller loses 3 life.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas
editions.flavor: "Which would you like first, the insult or the injury?"
"Which would you like first, the insult or the injury?"

name: Undertaker
text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.flavor: The weight of death is heavy but not immovable.
The weight of death is heavy but not immovable.

name: Undertow
text: Creatures with islandwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have islandwalk.

name: Underworld Cerberus
text:
Underworld Cerberus can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.
When Underworld Cerberus dies, exile it and each player returns all creature cards from his or her graveyard to his or her hand.

name: Underworld Coinsmith
text:
Constellation — Whenever Underworld Coinsmith or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
{W}{B}, Pay 1 life: Each opponent loses 1 life.

editions.flavor: Coins of the Underworld are shaped from clay funerary masks.
Coins of the Underworld are shaped from clay funerary masks.

name: Underworld Connections
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card."

editions.flavor: If you're looking for it, it's available. The question is how much you're willing to pay.
If you're looking for it, it's available. The question is how much you're willing to pay.
If you're looking for it, it's available. The question is how much you're willing to pay.

name: Underworld Dreams
text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Underworld Dreams deals 1 damage to him or her.

name: Undiscovered Paradise
text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. During your next untap step, as you untap your permanents, return Undiscovered Paradise to its owner's hand.

editions.flavor: Jolrael's choice of homes was far better than her choice of allies.

name: Undo
text: Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

editions.flavor:
"Oft have I wished to undo past deeds, but never did I imagine they would be undone for me."
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

name: Undying Beast
text: When Undying Beast dies, put it on top of its owner's library.

name: Undying Evil
text: Target creature gains undying until end of turn. (When it dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

editions.flavor:
"Is it true the evil that people do follows them into death? Let's find out."
—Liliana Vess

name: Undying Flames
text:
Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card. Undying Flames deals damage to target creature or player equal to that card's converted mana cost.
Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Undying Rage
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
When Undying Rage is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Undying Rage to its owner's hand.

editions.flavor: Radha was born in Skyshroud, but her temper is undeniably Keldon.

name: Unearth
text:
Return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Unearthly Blizzard
text: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.

editions.flavor:
"We are trapped. The mountains and blinding kami storms have made us hopelessly lost. We are starving. In the name of all things sacred, please, send help . . . ."
—Lost Battalion, final message to General Takeno

name: Unerring Sling
text: {3}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Unerring Sling deals damage equal to the tapped creature's power to target attacking or blocking creature with flying.

name: Unexpectedly Absent
text: Put target nonland permanent into its owner's library just beneath the top X cards of that library.

editions.flavor: Once you've been dragged down the currents of time, you'll never quite trust your own permanence again.
Once you've been dragged down the currents of time, you'll never quite trust your own permanence again.

name: Unexpected Potential
text:
Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)
You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast spells with the chosen name.

name: Unexpected Results
text: Shuffle your library, then reveal the top card. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield and return Unexpected Results to its owner's hand.

name: Unflinching Courage
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink.

editions.flavor: As Trostani's influence grew, vitality spread through the Conclave—much to the other guilds' dismay.
As Trostani's influence grew, vitality spread through the Conclave—much to the other guilds' dismay.

name: Unforge
text: Destroy target Equipment. If that Equipment was attached to a creature, Unforge deals 2 damage to that creature.

editions.flavor: Compared to the fire of the forge, the strength of steel is nothing.

name: Unfulfilled Desires
text: {1}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card, then discard a card.

editions.flavor:
"Like Day from Night, / I'll live my life apart from you, just glimpsing you across the sky, / because you cannot change, my dear, and nor can I."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Unhallowed Cathar
text: Unhallowed Cathar can't block.

editions.flavor:
"Just fight without fear. Your soul is protected by the hand of Avacyn and will never submit to evil."
—Thalia, to Constable Visil

name: Unhallowed Pact
text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Nissa vs. Ob Nixilis
editions.flavor: Agreements with demons seldom end at the grave.
Agreements with demons seldom end at the grave.
Agreements with demons seldom end at the grave.

name: Unhinge
text:
Target player discards a card.
Draw a card.

editions.flavor:
"Don't let your mind wander—it might not come back."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Unholy Citadel
text: Black legendary creatures you control have "bands with other legendary creatures." (Any legendary creatures can attack in a band as long as at least one has "bands with other legendary creatures." Bands are blocked as a group. If at least two legendary creatures you control, one of which has "bands with other legendary creatures," are blocking or being blocked by the same creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

name: Unholy Fiend
text: At the beginning of your end step, you lose 1 life.

editions.flavor: The fiend tormented them by recounting the girl's memories, as if some part of her remained inside that twisted shell.

name: Unholy Grotto
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{B}, {T}: Put target Zombie card from your graveyard on top of your library.

name: Unholy Hunger
text:
Destroy target creature.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you gain 2 life.

editions.flavor: Liliana viewed the attention of the angels as a testament to her power. Even so, they were an annoyance.

name: Unholy Strength
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.

editions.flavor: Such power grows the body as it shrinks the soul.

"Born under the moon, the second child will stumble on temptation and seek power in the dark places of the heart."
—Codex of the Constellari

"Born under the moon, the second child will stumble on temptation and seek power in the dark places of the heart."
—Codex of the Constellari
"I don't feel any different."

"Born under the moon, the second child will stumble on temptation and seek power in the dark places of the heart."
—Codex of the Constellari

editions.flavor: Such power grows the body as it shrinks the soul.

name: Unified Front
text: Converge — Create a 1/1 white Kor Ally creature token for each color of mana spent to cast Unified Front.

editions.flavor: The kor's pride in their independence has given way to a strong sense of community that embraces all of Zendikar.

name: Unified Strike
text: Exile target attacking creature if its power is less than or equal to the number of Soldiers on the battlefield.

editions.flavor: The tall, reedy grass of the Daru Plains rustles loudly in the winds, a perfect cover for any ambush.

name: Unified Will
text: Counter target spell if you control more creatures than that spell's controller.

editions.flavor:
"We're glad to be of service—to be an audience to your failure."
—Maizah Shere, Tazeem lullmage

name: Unifying Theory
text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player may pay {2}. If the player does, he or she draws a card.

editions.flavor: Scribbles of a lunatic and formulas of a genius are often indistinguishable.

name: Unimpeded Trespasser
text: Unimpeded Trespasser can't be blocked.

editions.flavor: Knocking was simply a formality.

name: Uninvited Geist
text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
When Uninvited Geist deals combat damage to a player, transform it.

editions.flavor: A slow knock at midnight is best left unanswered.

name: Unity of Purpose
text:
Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)
Untap each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

editions.flavor: Faced with the novel problem of inspiring an army, Jace asked himself: "What would Gideon say?"

name: Universal Solvent
text: {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Universal Solvent: Destroy target permanent.

editions.flavor:
"A few drops of this, and the trickiest problems simply melt away."
—Thamaz, Weldfast inventor

name: Unknown Shores
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. ({C} represents colorless mana.)
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: Kozilek's presence warped the land, stripping away layer after layer.
Philosophers speak of a place where myths wash like tides upon the shores of the real.

name: Unlicensed Disintegration
text: Destroy target creature. If you control an artifact, Unlicensed Disintegration deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

editions.flavor: "I'd stand back if I were you."

name: Unlikely Alliance
text: {1}{W}: Target nonattacking, nonblocking creature gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"Strange alliances are alliances still, and provide the same protection."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Unliving Psychopath
text:
{B}: Unliving Psychopath gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with power less than Unliving Psychopath's power.

editions.flavor:
"The victim bears the marks of the ‘Ktozok Impaler'. . . but he was executed years ago!"
—Gorev Hadszak, Wojek investigator

name: Unmake
text: Exile target creature.

editions.flavor: A gwyllion's favorite trap is the vanity mirror. A bewitched piece of glass traps the looker's soul and does away with the body.
A gwyllion's favorite trap is the vanity mirror. A bewitched piece of glass traps the looker's soul and does away with the body.
A gwyllion's favorite trap is the vanity mirror. A bewitched piece of glass traps the looker's soul and does away with the body.

name: Unmake the Graves
text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.flavor: "I'm raising an army. Any volunteers?"

name: Unmask
text:
You may exile a black card from your hand rather than pay Unmask's mana cost.
Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

name: Unnatural Aggression
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Target creature you control fights target creature an opponent controls. If the creature an opponent controls would die this turn, exile it instead.

editions.flavor: The battle served as a grim reminder of what a final victory for the Eldrazi would mean.

name: Unnatural Endurance
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Regenerate it.

editions.flavor:
"Eldrazi don't die easy. Sometimes they don't die at all."
—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist
